<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {

  // ── Tag / year mapping (keys are Quarto ref IDs: colons → hyphens) ──────
  const tagMap = {
    // 2025
    "James-PP2025":          { year: 2025, tags: ["timeseries analysis"] },
    "James-4.2ka":           { year: 2025, tags: ["event detection", "timeseries analysis"] },
    "Emile-Geay-2025":       { year: 2025, tags: ["data assimilation", "statistics"] },

    "Yang-ncomms2024":       { year: 2024, tags: ["ENSO", "reconstruction", "data assimilation"] },
    // 2023
    "Cropper-2023":          { year: 2023, tags: ["model evaluation"] },
    "pseudoPAGES2k":         { year: 2023, tags: ["proxy system modeling", "data compilation", "reconstruction"] },
    "CoralHydro2k-ESSD2023": { year: 2023, tags: ["data compilation"] },

    // 2022
    "Pyleoclim-PP2022":      { year: 2022, tags: ["timeseries analysis"] },
    "Manety-EDS2022":        { year: 2022, tags: ["timeseries analysis"] },
    "Zhu-ncomms2022":        { year: 2022, tags: ["ENSO", "volcanic response", "data assimilation"] },
    // 2021
    "geochronr-paper":       { year: 2021, tags: ["timeseries analysis"] },

    "ENSObook2020-ch05":     { year: 2020, tags: ["ENSO", "reconstruction"] },
    "Dee-Science2020a":      { year: 2020, tags: ["ENSO", "volcanic response"] },
    "Erb-SciAdv2020":        { year: 2020, tags: ["data assimilation", "ENSO"] },
    "Kaufman-2020a":         { year: 2020, tags: ["data compilation"] },
    "Zhu-GRL2020":           { year: 2020, tags: ["model evaluation", "volcanic response", "data assimilation"] },
    "Brierley-CP2020":       { year: 2020, tags: ["model evaluation"] },
    // 2019
    "PaCTS_v1":              { year: 2019, tags: ["data compilation"] },
    "Neukom-ngeo2019":       { year: 2019, tags: ["reconstruction", "model evaluation"] },
    "Tardif-CP19":           { year: 2019, tags: ["data assimilation", "reconstruction"] },
    "Zhu-PNAS2019":          { year: 2019, tags: ["model evaluation", "timeseries analysis"] },
    "Hu-PP2019":             { year: 2019, tags: ["proxy system modeling"] },
    "Barboza-2019":          { year: 2019, tags: ["reconstruction"] },
    // 2018
    "LinkedEarth-PAGES2018": { year: 2018, tags: ["data compilation"] },
    "McKay-PAGES2018":       { year: 2018, tags: ["data compilation"] },
    "Singh_CP18":            { year: 2018, tags: ["data assimilation"] },
    "Fischer-2018":          { year: 2018, tags: ["reconstruction"] },
    "Hu-jgr2018":            { year: 2018, tags: ["climate modeling"] },
    // 2017
    "PAGES2k_SD2017_allauthors": { year: 2017, tags: ["data compilation"] },
    "LMR_wrkshp3":           { year: 2017, tags: ["data assimilation"] },
    "Dee_proxyScaling":      { year: 2017, tags: ["proxy system modeling", "model evaluation"] },
    "Hu-epsl17":             { year: 2017, tags: ["timeseries analysis"] },
    // 2016
    "LMR1":                  { year: 2016, tags: ["data assimilation", "reconstruction"] },
    "Dee-JAMES2016":         { year: 2016, tags: ["proxy system modeling", "data assimilation"] },
    "lipd_cp":               { year: 2016, tags: ["data compilation"] },
    "JEG_McKay2016":         { year: 2016, tags: ["data compilation"] },
    "JEG_NatGeo2015":        { year: 2016, tags: ["ENSO", "model evaluation", "proxy system modeling"] },
    "JEG_Tingley_CP2016":    { year: 2016, tags: ["ENSO", "timeseries analysis", "statistics"] },
    "Chen_EPSL2016":         { year: 2016, tags: ["ENSO","timeseries analysis"] },
    // 2015
    "PRYSM":                 { year: 2015, tags: ["proxy system modeling"] },
    "Wang_GRL15":            { year: 2015, tags: ["reconstruction", "model evaluation"] },
    "Comboul_JClim2015":     { year: 2015, tags: ["reconstruction", "data assimilation"] },
    "Guillot_AOAS2015":      { year: 2015, tags: ["reconstruction", "statistics"] },
    "Khider_G3_2015":        { year: 2015, tags: ["proxy system modeling"] },
    "Dee_JGR15":             { year: 2015, tags: ["climate modeling"] },
    // 2014
    "Comboul_CP14":          { year: 2014, tags: ["proxy system modeling", "statistics"] },
    "Wang_CP2014":           { year: 2014, tags: ["reconstruction", "statistics"] },
    // 2013
    "JEG10a":                { year: 2013, tags: ["ENSO", "reconstruction"] },
    "JEG10b":                { year: 2013, tags: ["ENSO", "reconstruction"] },
    "EE13":                  { year: 2013, tags: ["data compilation"] },
    "Ault-GRL13":            { year: 2013, tags: ["ENSO", "timeseries analysis"] },
    "Partin_Geology2013":    { year: 2013, tags: ["ENSO"] },
    "DMT_2013":              { year: 2013, tags: ["proxy system modeling"] },
    // 2011
    "Khider_PA11":           { year: 2011, tags: ["ENSO", "reconstruction"] },
    "DMT_2011":              { year: 2011, tags: ["proxy system modeling", "ENSO"] },
    // 2010
    "Dutay10":               { year: 2010, tags: [] },
    // 2009
    "JEG_Madec09":           { year: 2009, tags: [] },
    "JEG09c":                { year: 2009, tags: ["ENSO"] },
    // 2008
    "JEG08":                 { year: 2008, tags: ["ENSO", "volcanic response", "Sun-climate connections"] },
    // 2007
    "JEG07":                 { year: 2007, tags: ["Sun-climate connections", "ENSO"] },
    "Herweijer_et_al2006b":  { year: 2007, tags: ["reconstruction"] },
    // 2003
    "JEG03":                 { year: 2003, tags: [] },
  };

  // ── 1. Annotate each .csl-entry with data-tags, data-year, and badge div ─
  const entries = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#refs .csl-entry'));

  entries.forEach(function (el) {
    const rawId = el.id.replace(/^ref-/, '').replace(/:/g, '-');
    const info = tagMap[rawId] || { year: 0, tags: [] };

    el.setAttribute('data-tags', info.tags.join('|'));
    el.setAttribute('data-year', info.year);

    if (info.tags.length > 0) {
      const badgeContainer = document.createElement('div');
      badgeContainer.className = 'pub-tags';
      info.tags.forEach(function (tag) {
        const badge = document.createElement('span');
        badge.className = 'pub-tag';
        badge.textContent = tag;
        badgeContainer.appendChild(badge);
      });
      el.appendChild(badgeContainer);
    }
  });

  // ── 2. Re-sort entries by year descending ─────────────────────────────────
  const refsDiv = document.getElementById('refs');
  const bib = refsDiv
    ? (refsDiv.querySelector('.csl-bib-body') || refsDiv)
    : null;

  if (bib) {
    entries.sort(function (a, b) {
      return (parseInt(b.getAttribute('data-year')) || 0) -
             (parseInt(a.getAttribute('data-year')) || 0);
    });
    entries.forEach(function (el) { bib.appendChild(el); });
  }

  // ── 3. Inject year-group headers after sorting ────────────────────────────
  let currentYear = null;
  entries.forEach(function (el) {
    const year = parseInt(el.getAttribute('data-year')) || 0;
    if (year !== currentYear && year > 0) {
      currentYear = year;
      const h2 = document.createElement('h2');
      h2.className = 'pub-year-header';
      h2.textContent = year;
      el.parentNode.insertBefore(h2, el);
    }
  });

  // ── 4. Filter button logic ────────────────────────────────────────────────
  document.querySelectorAll('.tag-btn').forEach(function (btn) {
    btn.addEventListener('click', function () {
      document.querySelectorAll('.tag-btn').forEach(function (b) {
        b.classList.remove('active');
      });
      this.classList.add('active');

      const tag = this.getAttribute('data-tag');

      entries.forEach(function (el) {
        if (tag === 'all') {
          el.style.display = '';
        } else {
          const tags = el.getAttribute('data-tags') || '';
          el.style.display = tags.split('|').includes(tag) ? '' : 'none';
        }
      });

      // Show/hide year headers based on whether any entry beneath them is visible
      document.querySelectorAll('.pub-year-header').forEach(function (h) {
        let next = h.nextElementSibling;
        let anyVisible = false;
        while (next && !next.classList.contains('pub-year-header')) {
          if (next.classList.contains('csl-entry') && next.style.display !== 'none') {
            anyVisible = true;
            break;
          }
          next = next.nextElementSibling;
        }
        h.style.display = anyVisible ? '' : 'none';
      });
    });
  });
});
</script>
